title: 8/10/21: Budget Reconciliation, Josh Hawley, Climate Change, AOC, Vaccine Mandates, Healthcare Mafia, Liberal Misinformation, Biden Economy, and More!

itunes:title: 8/10/21: Budget Reconciliation, Josh Hawley, Climate Change, AOC, Vaccine Mandates, Healthcare Mafia, Liberal Misinformation, Biden Economy, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and guest host Kyle Kulinski take a look at the budget reconciliation proposal in the senate, Sen. Josh Hawley's fundraising, a dire climate change warning, AOC's future, military vaccine mandate, American healthcare failures, liberal misinformation, the Biden economy, and more! Just as a reminder, Saagar is on vacation this week, so Kyle will be co-hosting until Saagar comes back next week.
